alert.note: Alert for Carlisle; Graves; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 11:56PM EDT until May 03 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hickman County in western Kentucky... Carlisle County in western Kentucky... Western Graves County in western Kentucky... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1056 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bardwell to near Clinton to 9 miles northeast of Hickman to near Cayce to near Union City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Clinton around 1100 PM CDT. Bardwell around 1105 PM CDT. Fulgham around 1115 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 4 and 18. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
